data.message: Eminem your song "Not Afraid" helped my 13 yr old son, Tim, get through a tough time and he is a finalist for an award at school because of the essay he wrote about your song. I just wanted to say thank you and let you know that your song inspires kids in a very positive way! Video attached in case you want to hear the essay. Thank you!! :)

replies.message: Thats so awesome that song helps me too im revovering from an addiction to pain killers i listen to this song on the hard days and it helps me to keep pushing foward i am getting better every day and i feel like im getting a new life starting to enjoy doing the simple things like spending time with my friends and family or just going to walmart lol things like that i couldnt enjoy in my addiction because i was eighther too dope sick or too high to do em and that song makes me not feel alone in the things i have went through and still going through .
I share this.. I started fighting that's to that song too.. he's music is very powerful. I've been his fan since I was 9, I guess when I heard that song everything came up again.. stay strong!
